response.overview: This film tells the story of the hero song Yanzu from an ignorant old man to a determined, steady and responsible man. In the film, song Yanzu, the man in the house, meets the resurrected doll, the beautiful girl MIA. MIA thinks that a Zhai is her lord, and she listens to him and has a secret affection for him. However, a Zhai always adores her company colleague Bing Bing. In Bing Bing Bing's dilemma, she repeatedly pays attention and finally gets her heart. At this time, Bingbing finds out Mia's existence and is very angry, and thinks that a Zhai has cheated her feelings by stepping on two boats. In front of the two girls, a Zhai satirizes Mia and lets her leave her life.
response.title: Tie Shen Nv Bao Biao
